Sergio Marchionne noted in a statement that Chrysler's recovery has so far bested industry expectations, but he added that the automaker was still a long way from meeting its objectives. Our job is not yet done, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` We have a lot of work ahead to fulfill our five-year business plan objectives.'' Simon Cowell has made no secret of the fact that he was underwhelmed by what Dublin had to offer- and it is believed to be under his orders that X Factor has axed the Irish leg. There is only so many places we can go on the audition trail, an insider revealed.`` We went to Dublin last year but we haven't been to Liverpool so we thought we should do that this year.'' State says he's not sure he'll back Barack Obama again in 2012. interview with CNN's Candy Crowley , Colin Powell said he won't formally endorse anyone until he actually sees who is on the 2012 ticket. I am not committed to Barack Obama . I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell said.`` I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates and finally see who the two candidates are who are going for this position.''
